Reviews.Title: It's a winner!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Vignali
Reviews.Content: Through my years of having cell phones........this is the best!!!  Quality of workmanship along with its audio make this a winner!!  This is the first cell phone I have had that I am not straining to listen to my caller.  For anyone who is looking for a flip phone ...........this is the one!!!

Reviews.Title: LG 1500
Reviews.Author: Christa Hagerman
Reviews.Content: I f you want a user friendly cell phone that is simple to operate without all the confusing buttons etc. T his is the one for you. This my second LG in 5 years. Long lasting very durable product. Mine went through a workout , dropped stepped on, left in the rain, you name it. This is a very awsome phone. And for the price it cannot be beat. I would stack this phone up against these 100.00 $ phones any time. . sHAME THERE ARE ONLY 5 STARS HERE ITS WORTH 10 !  Thank You LG !

Reviews.Title: The little phone with big savings
Reviews.Author: dazzling star
Reviews.Content: I love my phone because I have great reception no matter where I am located. The phone comes with FREE minutes and that saved time and money. This phone is great for people who are rough on phones because it is constructed sturdy and can take being thrown around.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Denise A. Moses
Reviews.Content: It arrived as expected. Great price for a new in the package cell phone. I like that the back is the battery. My old phone the back kept coming off.

Reviews.Title: handy
Reviews.Author: Jezeegirl
Reviews.Content: this was a phone that i got for my neice. we just wanted it for a spare phone and it did its job thank you

Reviews.Title: For a young person
Reviews.Author: Janet Sue Gagliardi "Janet Sue Gagliardi"
Reviews.Content: This phone may be wonderful for a young person who sees well and has nimble fingers.  It is not for an elderly person.  The plan was very good and, if I were 50 years younger, I would have loved the phone.  Thank you for the offer.

Reviews.Title: 1st cell phone for my husband
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Inman
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband.  He is 70 and this is his first and probably last cell phone unless he loses is.  Perfect for his minimal use.  I set up his contacts and he just has to hit a # to reach whoever he needs to reach.  Of course, I have had Net 10 myself for years and paying $15 a month for our usage is perfect.  He is now accumulating minutes like I do.  :)

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: lemuel cook
Reviews.Content: I love my phone, it's basic, but gets the job done. I use my phone mostly for work& home, and the volume is just right.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone!
Reviews.Author: Karen Chirilov
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my old cracked phone. Some model of course since the old one never let me down. I like the smallness of it! Fits in any pocket! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good phone but had problems
Reviews.Author: justsocool!
Reviews.Content: When I bought this phone it worked well for a while then it developed problems that I couldn't fix, so I bought a different phone and this other phone works great!

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal and the phone's great, too!
Reviews.Author: April Goodwin
Reviews.Content: Okay, it's not a Smartphone but to me, a Smartphone is dumb. Paying $500 not to talk to people (lots of people avoid answering) is DUMB. Checking up on the intellectual wasteland that is Facebook is DUMB. Paying $5.99 for a flip phone PLUS 300 minutes of airtime?BRILLIANT. One star off for the echo I usually hear when talking to my partner (I ordered two of these bad boys) but that's about it for downsides. Holds a charge for a couple of days, unlike my last Net10.All in all, this camper is happy! :)

Reviews.Title: Simple phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: janjill "janjill"
Reviews.Content: This is simple phone for a great price. It is a basic flip phone that is easy to use. No camera.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: valerie karwowski
Reviews.Content: this is a good phone for anyone who just wants the basics. cumbersome texting but the phone works great. very inexpensive and comes with 300 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do
Reviews.Author: D. Buller
Reviews.Content: I like having this phone with features that don't distract me.  It's very basic.  The battery life is not very good by modern-day standards. I can also only store a few txt messages in the phone.  I've had to clear all messages twice in the last month.  But I really don't care about these things.With this phone, a person can buy a talk/txt plan with 200 minutes for $15/mo. (and a cheap phone).  That's what I needed.

Reviews.Title: dad birthday gift
Reviews.Author: korina
Reviews.Content: Well my dad not all high tech and got for his birthday came just in time just wish keys were bigger but it also comes with minutes which was good:)

Reviews.Title: LG 1500 Cell Pnone
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: The LG 1500 is amazingly small and easy to carry and has a clean connection that is better than I am used to. If it had Blue Tooth it would be perfect!
